review: I am on a campaign against Roku. Received it as a gift. Still don't know how I will tell my nephew I can't use it. I've owned 4 other devices for streaming and Roku was the first one that I've tried to activate only to find that the device is useless unless you supply a credit card number. I already have accounts for Amazon and Netflix and some free providers. I don't intend now or ever to subscribe to anything else through Roku. BUT they won't let you use the already paid for device until you turn over your personal information. DON'T buy Roku. Go Fire TV Stick. Even if you don't have an Amazon Prime account (consider getting one) the stick will provide many options.
author: Uncle Billy "Bill"
